title: Nanoplastic at environmentally relevant concentrations activates a germline mir-240-rab-5 signaling cascade to affect the secreted ligands associated with transgenerational toxicity induction in C. elegans
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3615-3624
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00309H, Paper
Xin Hua, Le Zhang, Dayong Wang
Epigenetic regulation plays an important role in regulating the transgenerational toxicity of pollutants.
